entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishTrimmed build time regression. #40060

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [IP] add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2425464 #40043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set dotnet-watch timeout based on XUnitWorkItemTimeout #40028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
